select * from( SELECT * , (select max(v_date) from visit where restaurant.r_no=visit.r_no)as v_date FROM shop.restaurant where r_no in (select r_no from visit where u_no= #{u_no} group by r_no)
and (r_name LIKE '%${searchWord}%' OR r_foodtype LIKE '%${searchWord}%')
and ${searchType} LIKE '%${searchWord}%'
)t
and v_date >= date_add(now(), interval -1 month)
and v_date >= date_add(now(), interval -2 month)
and where v_date >= date_add(now(), interval -3 month)
order by v_date desc LIMIT ${startIdx},5;
